body_html: So, I got deceived by my C++ heuristic that says that if you can do it with overloads, don't use a template; I couldn't actually construct an example where it mattered if tensor was templated or not. So... carry on!

body: So, I got deceived by my C++ heuristic that says that if you can do it with overloads, don't use a template; I couldn't actually construct an example where it mattered if tensor was templated or not. So... carry on!
